dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 33 EAS:
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

engrossed-amendment-form.current-chamber: In the Senate of the United States,

section.text: That the bill from the House of Representatives (H.R. 33) entitled An Act to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to ensure that emergency services volunteers are not taken into account as employees under the shared responsibility requirements contained in the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act., do pass with the following

amendment-instruction.text: Strike all after the enacting clause and insert the following:

section.text: The Continuing Appropriations Resolution, 2015 (Public Law 113â€“164; 128 Stat. 1867) is amended by striking the date specified in section 106(3) and inserting March 6, 2015.
